title: Instagram Introduces Galleries, Completely Changes the Way You'll Use It
text: Instagram Introduces Galleries, Completely Changes the Way You'll Use It Most Popular By Alyssa Bailey Feb 22, 2017 Instagram just unveiled a game-changing feature on the app: the introduction of gallery posts where you can put up to 10 photos and videos in one 'gram. A post shared by Elle Magazine (@elleusa) on Feb 22, 2017 at 8:02am PST Advertisement - Continue Reading Below To use it, start to upload a photo as you typically would. You'll have the option of selecting multiple photos, choosing their order, and applying the same filter to all of them. A sample screenshot from Instagram Instagram Photos are square-only and have a single caption for now, according to Instagram's blog .
